alert.note: Alert for Fairfield; Litchfield (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued September 29 at 2:24PM EDT until September 30 at 12:05PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Albany NY has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Connecticut... Still River At Brookfield affecting Fairfield and Litchfield Counties. && ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Still River at Brookfield. * WHEN...Until early tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, The river begins to flood roads and parking lots. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:45 PM EDT Friday the stage was 11.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this afternoon to a crest of 13.9 feet late this evening. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Still River Brookfield Flood Stage: 12.0 Observed Stage at Fri 1 pm: 11.4 Forecast: Fri 8 pm 13.8 Sat 2 am 12.7 Sat 8 am 11.5 Sat 2 pm 10.4 Sat 8 pm 9.6 &&
